title: What Is Metacognition?
description: Learn What Is Metacognition? in one minute.

hook.text: You finished studying and felt confident. Then the test proved you wrong.

buildup.text: Metacognition is thinking about your own thinkingâ€”monitoring and controlling it.

discovery.text: Good learners constantly ask: 'Do I actually understand this or does it just feel familiar?'

twist.text: Familiarity and fluency create dangerous illusions of knowing.

climax.text: Metacognitive skills can be taught and they improve performance across subjects.

punchline.text: Knowing what you don't know is half the battle.
